    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    UserDAO.getUser(String login, String password)
    Retrieves the user with the given login and password, if it exists.
    Methods in com.epam.dataaccess.dao that return types with arguments of type User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<User>
    UserDAO.getAllSubscriber()
    Retrieves a list of all users with the role of "subscriber."
    List<User>
    UserDAO.getAllUnblockedSubscriber()
    Retrieves a list of all subscribers who have an unblocked status.
    List<User>
    UserDAO.getSubscriberForCharging()
    Retrieves a list of subscribers who have an unblocked status and have a tariff with days until next payment equal to 0.
    List<User>
    UserDAO.getSubscriberForView(String searchField, int offset, int entriesPerPage)
    Retrieves a filtered list of subscribers for view, with pagination.
